name: comatose
effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep. It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.
short_effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.
